description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension with installation of 1no front rooflight to facilitate loft conversion. Associated changes to fenestration.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to demonstrate through the submission of accurate drawings that the eaves of the original roof would be maintained or reinstated and that the edge of the enlargement closest to the eaves of the original roof is, so far as practicable, would be not less than 0.2 metres from the eaves, measured along the roof slope from the outside edge of the eaves, contrary to Paragraphs B.2(b)(i)(aa) and (bb) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The applicant has failed to indicate that the materials used in any exterior work of the proposed development would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Condition A.3 (a) and B.2(a) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A and B of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
